description.value:
The Azlanti frown upon non-Azlanti and non-nobility wearing these silvery cloaks. When you wear an Azlanti noble’s cloak, once per day, you can choose one attack roll that hits you. That roll must be rerolled, requiring no action on your part. In addition, once per day as a reaction to an attack hitting or missing you, you can turn invisible, per the @Compendium[sfrpg.spells.YDXegEus8p0BnsH1]{Invisibility} spell, for 1 minute. You can take this reaction during a surprise round even if you can’t otherwise act during that round. If you use a given Azlanti noble’s cloak, you can’t benefit from a different one for 24 hours.


Add spell to your sheet. Then after adding the spell to the Spellbook tab, edit the spell's Details, changing the Spell Preparation Mode to Innate Spellcasting, and change Limited uses to 1 of 1 Day. Editing the spell's name, activation cost, and duration is also recommended.
